title: Petitions and complaints: helping to make rights a reality (FRA - Fundamental Rights Agency)
text: ( Source : FRA - Fundamental Rights Agency ) FRA spoke about how access to justice through petitions and complaints enables and empowers individuals. It ensures the meaningful enforcement of rights and lies at the core of what it means to turn
